Chang-gun Yang‚Äôs 2nd Album ‚ÄòAn Old Heart‚Äô

Chang-gun Yang is a korean musician. He released his second album, "Old Heart," in the fall of 2016. We designed his album cover and lyrics book.

design: Yul Bae
